name: Spingo Mazed Gold
description:
Help the cunning otter Spingo get to the Leprechaun's chest and collect as much gold as possible along the way!

This is the first version of the game, there are a number of things that need to be completed.The project will be finalized and developed.

Our team:

  • Tiurkov Leonid - Unity Developer
  • Lucenko Daria - Scenario, idea
  • Lucenko Varvara - Artist

Some assets, that I used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/rogue-fantasy-castle-16472...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/pixel-art-icon-pack-rpg-15834...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/rpg-fantasy-mobile-gui-with-source-...
